Articles.Content: So i was trying to set up a terreria server, and i shut down all power to my router and my computer, and now on gmail im getting some secuirty certificate errors. HELP! IDK WHATS HAPPENING! i even get security errors in the PM System here! :\'( :\'( :\'( :\'(
I\'d ask Tiberion. He knows everything about these things. :b

Wow... i just googled it and turns out the problem was for some reason my clock went from 2012 to 2005! XD thats why! XD

I geuss a mod can lock this now.
Oh, my old laptop always resets itself to 2007, October 31st everytime I turn it on. Halloween curse, lol?
